Arrrh !, DirecktX :-).

But year, what about the languge ?, can it be changed ?
so if i turn off my antiv and re install it should work?

It is english by default but you can do this.

Language change steps:
1. Go to run and type regedit
2. It will take you to the registry editor, click the down arrow on "HKEY_LOCAL_MACHINE"
3. Then on "Software"
4. Then go down to "Sims"
5. Click on "The Sims 3"
6. See the thing that says locale? Right click on it and choose modify.
7. Change the value data to EN-us, that stands for English U.S. or any of the others
languages=en-us,fr-fr,es-es,es-mx,de-de,it-it,nl-nl,sv-se,da-dk,no-no,fi-fi,pl-pl,pt-pt,hu-hu,cs-cz,pt-br,el-gr,ru-ru,ko-kr,zh-hk,ja-jp

or you can download the language changer from here
http://www.modthesims.info/download.php?t=423644

Hey peeps! 
I think i've fixed the problem with the non-launching game. You need to download a missing d3dx9_31.dll file. Just google it. You need to download this file and place it directly in you system32 folder. and voila - now you can probably start your game!! Mine is allready loading my town! hurray :D
